speakers.name: Linda Rising
speakers.miniBio: Fearless Change author, specializes in patters, agile, and the change process.

speakers.name: Michael Feathers
speakers.miniBio: Consultor on legacy code issues, and author of the seminal book on the subject.

program.title: Be a speaker
program.description: Agile Brazil 2015's schedule expects a wide variety of subjects and themes. You can be a speaker!

place.title: The place
place.description: Porto de Galinhas host us, this year. Learn about the city, the beaches, how to get there, and prepare your trip

sponsorship.title: Make your brand known
sponsorship.description: Put your brand on the spotlight and connect to a strongly skilled community of agile specialists
sponsorship.callToBeSponsor:
Agile Brazil is an excellent opportunity to showcase your brand, products and services to the people who are most interested in Agile in Brazil. Highlight your company's name and find good hires among the thousand agilist attendees we expect in 2015.
We offer many sponsorship levels, and we can help you find the one that brings most advantages to your company. Get more information on the e-mail patrocinios@agilebrazil.com.
